fracture_analysis_2d.test.test_init module¶

Tests QGIS plugin init.

class fracture_analysis_2d.test.test_init.TestInit(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Test that the plugin init is usable for QGIS.

Based heavily on the validator class by Alessandro Passoti available here:

http://github.com/qgis/qgis-django/blob/master/qgis-app/

plugins/validator.py

test_read_init()¶

Test that the plugin __init__ will validate on plugins.qgis.org.

fracture_analysis_2d.test.utilities module¶

Common functionality used by regression tests.

fracture_analysis_2d.test.utilities.get_qgis_app()¶

Start one QGIS application to test against.

Returns

Handle to QGIS app, canvas, iface and parent. If there are any errors the tuple members will be returned as None.

Return type

(QgsApplication, CANVAS, IFACE, PARENT)

If QGIS is already running the handle to that app will be returned.
